trans-unit.source: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a data source that are used to fill the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> and update the data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据命令集和到数据源的连接，它们用于填充 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 以及更新该数据源。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> serves as a bridge between a `DataSet` and data source for retrieving and saving data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>用作之间的桥梁`DataSet`和用于检索和保存数据的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> provides this bridge by using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> to load data from the data source into the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to send changes made in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> back to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>通过使用提供此桥<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>将数据从数据源到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，并使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>发送中所做更改<xref:System.Data.DataSet>回数据源。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> fills a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it creates the required tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>填充<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，如果不存在创建所需的表和列返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.AddWithKey>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，主键信息不包含在隐式创建的架构除非<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction.AddWithKey>。

trans-unit.source: You may also have the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> create the schema of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, including primary key information, before filling it with data using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还有<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>创建的架构<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，包括主键信息、 使用数据填充它之前<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you call the `Fill` method on a data source that does not have a primary key column, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> tries to promote the unique constraint column to the primary key.
trans-unit.target: 当调用`Fill`方法不具有主键列，对数据源<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>尝试将提升为主键的唯一约束列。

trans-unit.source: In the process, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> marks the unique constraint as not nullable.
trans-unit.target: 在过程中，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>将标记为不可为 null 的唯一约束。

trans-unit.source: This behavior works unless there is a null value in the unique constraint column.
trans-unit.target: 此行为适用，除非存在位于唯一约束列中 null 值。

trans-unit.source: If there is a null value, the `Fill` method fails with a constraint violation.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有一个 null 值，`Fill`方法将失败并违反了约束。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, do not allow null values in the unique constraint column.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免这种情况下，唯一约束列中不允许使用 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Due to the limitations of native ODBC drivers, only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is ever returned when you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 由于本机 ODBC 驱动程序，只有一个限制<xref:System.Data.DataTable>在调用时返回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is true even when executing SQL batch statements from which multiple <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects would be expected.
trans-unit.target: 这是 true，即使从多个执行 SQL 批处理语句<xref:System.Data.DataTable>正常的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> also includes the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>还包括<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>，和`TableMappings`属性以便于加载和更新的数据。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> to select records and populate a `DataSet` with the selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>，和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>选择记录并填充`DataSet`与所选的行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>，以下的只写和只读属性被设置为其默认值，如表所示。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 默认值

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" /> that is an SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure, and is set as the <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" />，它是一个 SQL SELECT 语句或存储过程，被设置为 <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> class with the specified SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 SQL SELECT 语句初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> constructor sets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>构造函数集<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性中指定的值`selectCommand`参数。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>，以下的只写和只读属性被设置为其默认值，如表所示。

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: A string that is a SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示将由 <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 属性使用的 SQL SELECT 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> that represents the connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示连接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> class with an SQL SELECT statement and an <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 用一个 SQL SELECT 语句和一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> can be useful in an application that must call the `Fill` method for two or more <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>很有用的应用程序必须调用中`Fill`方法为两个或多个<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: A string that is a SQL SELECT statement or stored procedure to be used by the <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示将由 <see cref="P:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 属性使用的 SQL SELECT 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> class with an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SQL SELECT 语句和连接字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> constructor uses the `selectConnectionString` parameter to set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>构造函数使用`selectConnectionString`参数设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, it does not open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它不开放连接。

trans-unit.source: You still must explicitly open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 你仍必须显式打开连接。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>并设置其属性的一些。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于删除数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" /> used during an update operation to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 在更新操作期间使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" />，它用来删除数据源中与 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中已删除的行相对应的记录。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>属性分配给以前创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>、<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>不是组和主键信息位于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>，和对帐所需的其他命令<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据源。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have already created an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to insert new records into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或用于将新记录插入数据源的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" /> used during an update operation to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 在更新操作期间用于在对应于 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中新行的数据源中插入记录的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> property is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性分配给以前创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>对象，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>不是组和主键信息位于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>，和对帐所需的其他命令<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据源。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能添加到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>取决于你如何设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have already created an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在针对数据源执行命令之后的更新操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 执行顺序如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataRow>移动到的参数值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行。

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> before a command is executed against the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在对数据源执行命令前的 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> 过程中发生。

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur per data row updated.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 执行顺序如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataRow>移动到的参数值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行。

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果将放置在<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to select records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或存储过程，用于选择数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" /> that is used during a fill operation to select records from data source for placement in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" />，在填充操作过程中用于从数据源选择记录以放置在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>分配到以前创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>、<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> returns no rows, no tables are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and no exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>不返回任何行，没有表将添加到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，并且不引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have already created an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> used during an update to delete records in the data source for deleted rows in the data set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" />，在更新过程中，用于针对数据集中删除的行删除数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> that is used during an update to insert records from a data source for placement in the data set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" />，在更新过程中，用于插入数据源中的记录，以便放入数据集中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> that is used during an update to select records from a data source for placement in the data set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" />，在更新过程中，用于选择数据源中的记录，以便放入数据集中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> used during an update to update records in the data source for modified rows in the data set.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" />，在更新过程中，用于针对数据集中修改的行更新数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.ICloneable.Clone" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 作为此实例副本的新 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ICloneable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SQL 语句或用于在数据源中更新记录的存储过程。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" /> used during an update operation to update records in the data source that correspond to modified rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand" />，用于在更新操作期间在对应于 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中被修改行的数据源中更新记录。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> is assigned to a previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> is not cloned.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>分配到以前创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>、<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>不克隆。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> maintains a reference to the previously created <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>保留以前创建的引用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: During an update operation, if <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> is not set and primary key information is present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> class to automatically generate <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and additional commands needed to reconcile the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新操作期间，如果<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>不是组和主键信息位于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>类自动生成<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>，和对帐所需的其他命令<xref:System.Data.DataSet>到数据源。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。

trans-unit.source: The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 生成逻辑也需要要中存在的键列信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。

trans-unit.source: If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> depending upon how you set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行此命令返回行，这些行可能会与合并<xref:System.Data.DataSet>取决于你如何设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and sets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>和设置<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It assumes that you have already created an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它假定你已创建<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection>对象。
